SEARCH
Package com.example.lotterysystemproject.viewmodels

Class EntrantViewModel

java.lang.Object
androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
com.example.lotterysystemproject.viewmodels.EntrantViewModel
public class EntrantViewModel extends androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
ViewModel that manages entrant data for a specific event. Handles operations such as loading entrants, filtering by status, and performing actions like drawing a lottery or replacements.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    EntrantViewModel()
    Initializes the EntrantViewModel and repository.

    • loadEntrants

      public void loadEntrants(String eventId)
      Loads entrants associated with a given event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The unique ID of the event.

    • getAllEntrants

      public androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<List<Entrant>> getAllEntrants()
      Returns all entrants for the current event.
      Returns:
      LiveData list of all entrants.

    • getWaitingList

      public androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<List<Entrant>> getWaitingList()
      Returns only entrants with Entrant.Status.WAITING.
      Returns:
      LiveData list of waiting entrants.

    • getSelectedEntrants

      public androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<List<Entrant>> getSelectedEntrants()
      Returns entrants with status other than Entrant.Status.WAITING.
      Returns:
      LiveData list of selected entrants.

    • getFilteredSelected

      public androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<List<Entrant>> getFilteredSelected(Entrant.Status filterStatus)
      Filters selected entrants by a specific status.
      Parameters:
      filterStatus - The status to filter by (e.g. INVITED, CANCELLED, etc.)
      Returns:
      LiveData list of filtered entrants.

    • drawLottery

      public void drawLottery(int count, EntrantRepository.OnLotteryCompleteListener listener)
      Performs a lottery draw for a specified number of entrants.
      Parameters:
      count - Number of entrants to select.
      listener - Callback for success or failure.

    • cancelEntrant

      public void cancelEntrant(String entrantId, EntrantRepository.OnActionCompleteListener listener)
      Cancels a specific entrant from the list.
      Parameters:
      entrantId - The ID of the entrant to cancel.
      listener - Callback for operation result.

      public void drawReplacement(EntrantRepository.OnReplacementDrawnListener listener)
